## Erc20SignatureMintable.verify() method

Verify that a payload is correctly signed

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

| Parameter     | Type                                        | Description           |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| signedPayload | [SignedPayload20](./sdk.signedpayload20.md) | the payload to verify |
